tool_description: API to convert Text to audio file . Multiple audio file output formats(wav, mp3, ogg) supported. Multiple male & female voice also supported.
name: text2wav
title: text2wav

api_list.name: Text2Wav - Memory Output
api_list.description: Use this Endpoint to Convert Text to  Audio Memory /Browser Object

required_parameters.name: phrase
required_parameters.description: This is text phrase to be converted into speech in memory, limited to **400** characters.

optional_parameters.name: voice
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the voice of speaker.** It can be either male or female. **

api_list.name: Text2Wav - File Output
api_list.description: Use this Endpoint to Convert Text to Downloadable Audio File(wav,mp3,ogg)

required_parameters.name: phrase
required_parameters.description: This is text phrase to be converted into speech, limited to **400** characters.

optional_parameters.name: voice
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the voice of speaker.** It can be either male or female. **

optional_parameters.name: filetype
optional_parameters.description: The is the filetype of the output speech file. Valid values are -  **wav or mp3 or ogg**
